channel.title: Glossary on MeVisLab Examples

item.title: Introduction
item.description: MeVisLab Tutorial Introduction Welcome to MeVisLab! MeVisLab is a development environment for rapid prototyping and product development of medical and industrial imaging applications. It includes a Software Development Kit (SDK) and an ApplicationBuilder for deploying your applications to end-customers. The MeVisLab SDK consists of an Integrated Development Environment (IDE) for visual programming and the advanced text editor MATE for Python scripting including code completion, debugging, profiling and automated test development or execution.
